__construct.name: __construct

parent.name: check
parent.summary: Checks whether the error property has been set (so an error happened).

getCron.name: getCron
getCron.summary: Returns the full row as an indexed array for the given CRON ID.

isTimeout.name: isTimeout

start.name: start
start.summary: Writes in the given CRON row the next start time, the current as previous, and the new running status.

finish.name: finish
finish.summary: Writes in the given CRON row the duration and the new finished status.

getNextDate.name: getNextDate
getNextDate.summary: Returns a SQL date for the next event given a frequency and a time to count from (now if 0).

arguments.name: frequency
arguments.description: A string made of 1 letter (i, h, d, w, m, or y) and a number.

arguments.name: from_time
arguments.description: time A SQL formatted date which will be the base of the operation.

getNext.name: getNext
getNext.summary: Returns the whole row for the next CRON to be executed from now if there is any.

getRunningRows.name: getRunningRows

getNextRows.name: getNextRows

getFailed.name: getFailed

notifyFailed.name: notifyFailed

activate.name: activate
activate.summary: Sets the active column to 1 for the given CRON ID.

deactivate.name: deactivate
deactivate.summary: Sets the active column to 0 for the given CRON ID.

setPid.name: setPid
setPid.summary: Sets the pid' column to the given value for the given CRON ID.

unsetPid.name: unsetPid
unsetPid.summary: Sets the pid and notification columns to null for the given CRON ID.

add.name: add

addSingle.name: addSingle

edit.name: edit

test.name: test
test.summary: Checks whether the error property has been set (so an error happened).

parent.name: test
parent.summary: Checks whether the error property has been set (so an error happened).

log.name: log

parent.name: log

__call.name: __call

parent.name: __call

getPidPath.name: getPidPath

getLogPath.name: getLogPath

getLogTree.name: getLogTree

getDayLogs.name: getDayLogs

get_log_prev_next.name: get_log_prev_next

getLastLogs.name: getLastLogs

getLastLog.name: getLastLog

isActive.name: isActive
isActive.summary: Returns true if the file data_folder/.active exists, false otherwise.

isCronActive.name: isCronActive
isCronActive.summary: Returns true if the file data_folder/.cron exists, false otherwise.

isPollActive.name: isPollActive
isPollActive.summary: Returns true if the file data_folder/.poll exists, false otherwise.
